import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './booking.css'; import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap'; const Booking = ({ hotel, avgRating }) => { const { price, reviews } = hotel; const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userIdL: '01', userEmail: 'example@gmail.com', fullName: '', phone: '', guestSize: 1, bookAt: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => {}; return (

${price} /day{' '}

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* booking form */}
Information
${price} /day
${price}

$10
Total
$109
); }; export default Booking;
